message.body: Hey. I was wondering if you could do Ryans first birthday cakes? We are having two seperate parties and we would need two small smash cakes =)
Yea that's no a problem.. what's the date again?
Saturday August 2nd and Monday August 4th. I assume 25 people each day.
The smash cakes are just for ryan right? Or am I doing smash cakes and the cakes for everyone else?
Two smash Two cakes for everyone to eat
The smash can be a small can or like a bigger cupcake
Oh yea no problem... the two cakes for everyone else can be round 9", 10" or 12"
Then I have rectangle: quarter sheet or half sheet cake
Whatever would feed 25.
Ok, if I do it out of icing, The design would be flat like it is on the sheet cake picture... I can also look for toppers as well. What are these characters called again?
That's fine. Go for whatever you think is best. They are the bubble guppies.
1 golf fish 3 girls and 3 boys. Even if you can get one boy. Like the one with the blue hair (Gil)
There's a bubble puppy in the group lol. He loves him and gil
Lol ok, ill look around and see what I can find... the half sheet for monday is one layer?
Yup. Thank you.
Ok, then saturday can be the regular round or rectangular ones? Which would be two layers
Yup. What ever shape is easiest for you.
Ok, sounds good lol. Once I have all the designs figured out I'll let you know much
Thank you so much. I need the smash cakes vanilla. Ryan breaks out from chocolate
Ok no problem. Then what flavor for sat night? What flavor for half sheet? (And Half sheet is big enough to do half & half)
Sheet cake half and half. If you can do one layer vanilla and one chocolate that would be great for Saturday. If not vanilla
Yea I can do that
Thank you so much!
You're welcome
